name: David Iweala
aboutpara: A Software Engineer offering 2+ years of work experience. I have functioned as a full-stack engineer and I am actively involved in deploying fault tolerant applications while also ensuring their availability using orchestration tools, configuration management tools, logging and monitoring tools. I am proficient in the use of programming languages like Python(Django), React Js, Node.js. I am also experienced with developing, maintaining, and integrating APIs.

resume.description: A Software Engineer offering 2+ years of work experience. I have functioned as a full-stack engineer and I am actively involved in deploying fault tolerant applications while also ensuring their availability using orchestration tools, configuration management tools, logging and monitoring tools. I am proficient in the use of programming languages like Python(Django), React Js, Node.js. I am also experienced with developing, maintaining, and integrating APIs.

experiences.bullets: Collect the new technologies and tools and introduced them to the company; in which  way it helped the company build up an agile development environment. It improved the  product quantity and the work efficiency. , Worked with a team of four developers to build a web app for travel booking hotel  booking and other travel related services. , Managed Amazon Web Services for the OTA project including configuration deployment and maintenance of all required infrastructure administrative tasks and  budgeting. , Collaborated using Atlassian tools including Jira Confluence Notion and slack 2 , Implemented continuous integration and delivery pipeline using Jenkins GitHub Netlify  Heroku AWS Docker and Kubernetes clusters

Worked with a team of three developers to create an app that enables users donate to  people that request for help through our platform , Performed code reviews to ensure adherence to company coding standards and best  practices. , Actively participated in all stages of the software development process including  requirements gathering development testing and deployment. , Managed and maintained Netlify deployments Kubernetes clusters AWS instances and  Heroku deployments.

experiences.position: Network Engineer (Intern) at Covenant University Center for System and Information services
experiences.bullets: Monitored system performance and identified potential issues to be escalated to senior  staff. , Created and maintained user accounts groups and permissions in Active Directory. , Provided technical support for all users of the network and ensured that security policies  are followed by everyone in the organization. , Assisted in Configuring and maintaining Cisco routers switches firewalls and VPNs for  secure remote access to company servers , Maintained existing network infrastructure including patching security vulnerabilities  upgrading outdated equipment and troubleshooting problems , Installed new wireless router system that increased productivity by 50% among  employees with mobile devices

experiences.position: Software Developer (Intern) at Hebron Start-up Lab
experiences.bullets: Actively participated in all stages of the software development process including  requirements gathering development testing and deployment. , Contributed to the development of software applications using Django WordPress and  JavaScript technologies. , Assisted in the organization of a program for aspiring entrepreneurs. This program  included trainings and workshop sessions.
